mapper.insert: insert into record(member_no, cardset_no, category, rightcnt, wrongcnt, method, recordday) values(#{member_no}, #{cardset_no}, #{category}, #{rightcnt}, #{wrongcnt}, #{method},now())
insert into study(member_no, cardset_no, studyday, category) values (#{member_no}, #{cardset_no}, now(), #{category})
mapper.select: select * from record where member_no = #{member_no} and cardset_no in (select cardset_no from record group by cardset_no) order by cardset_no asc, method desc, recordday asc
select * from record where member_no = #{member_no} and category = #{category} and cardset_no in (#{cardset_no}) order by cardset_no asc, method desc, recordday asc

select s.title, s.comment, s.name, s.profile, st.no, st.member_no, st.cardset_no, st.category, st.studyday, s.cnt from ( select r.*, (select max(st.no) from study st where r.board_no = st.cardset_no) as no, (select count(*) from board_card bc where r.board_no = bc.cardset_no) as cnt from ( select b.board_no as board_no, b.subject as title, b.content as comment, m.name, if( INSTR(profile,'google')>0, m.profile, if( INSTR(m.profile,'kakao')>0, m.profile, if( INSTR(m.profile,m.no)>0, concat('http://localhost:9000/profile/users/',m.profile), concat('http://localhost:9000/profile/default/',m.profile) ) ) ) as profile from board b, member m where b.no = m.no and b.board_no in ( select s.cardset_no from study s where s.no in #{item} ) ) as r )as s, study st where s.no = st.no

select s.*, t.name, t.profile, t.title, t.comment, t.cnt from ( select t.*, (select max(st.no) from study st where t.cardset_no = st.cardset_no) as no, (select count(*) from card c where t.cardset_no = c.cardset_no) as cnt from ( select c.no as cardset_no, c.title, c.comment, c.open_scope, c.update_scope, m.name, if( INSTR(profile,'google')>0, m.profile, if( INSTR(m.profile,'kakao')>0, m.profile, if( INSTR(m.profile,m.no)>0, concat('http://localhost:9000/profile/users/',m.profile), concat('http://localhost:9000/profile/default/',m.profile) ) ) ) as profile
from cardset c, member m where c.member_no = m.no and c.no in( select s.cardset_no from study s where s.no in #{item} ) ) as t ) as t, study s where t.no = s.no
